title: Ep. 724 The Swamp Is Put on Notice by President Trump
description:
Summary:
Donald Trump has ordered an investigation into the origins of the spying scandal on his campaign team. In this episode I explain what this means for the Swamp. I also explain the intricate web of deception designed to cover up Obama’s role in this. 
 
News Picks:
The FBI source’s name in the Trump witch hunt is making rounds in the media. 
 
Unreal. Another Russian with ties to the Clintons contacts the Trump team. 
 
The Obama Fixer and her client reappear.
 
Why did former Obama lawyer Bob Bauer leave his law firm? 
 
Another great piece about the Russia witch hunt. 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
